body: This is easily one of the best NaruxHina doujins. Drunk Naruto forcing himself on his wife is fucking top tier hot shit. Hinata is so sexy, and NaruxHina is so wholesome and hot.
This is like experiencing a perfect chocolate curl.
This a quality translation.  Great choices of font for everything.  If you look, you have different fonts for different tones and sfx (which are also translated).

The font is because he is drunk.  Also, the font is to convey the fact that she is trying to say "no" with more and more conviction.  Obviously, she has trouble telling him no for anything, but that's the reasoning for the font.

HoneyBee

1. All this NaruHina vanilla is giving me cavities.
2. Someone else needs to translate this.
4 NaruHina hentais in a row! I might die with my dick in my hand, because of overdosing on vanila and sugar!
